subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Boston College’s top scorer is forward Chris Kreider, the Rangers’ first-round draft pick in 2009. He is pondering whether to stay in college or join the N.H.L.
snippet: Boston College’s top scorer is forward Chris Kreider, the Rangers’ first-round draft pick in 2009. He is pondering whether to stay in college or join the N.H.L.
